ns2:test-suite.name: The Automation Practice site E2E flow

test-case.name: As a new user, I want to signin to the application
test-case.title: As a new user, I want to signin to the application

step.name: Given I am on the home page
step.title: Given I am on the home page

step.name: When I click on the sign in button
step.title: When I click on the sign in button

step.name: Then I should navigate to the My Accounts page
step.title: Then I should navigate to the My Accounts page

test-case.name: As a new user, I want to create a new account
test-case.title: As a new user, I want to create a new account

step.name: Given I am on the my account page
step.title: Given I am on the my account page

step.name: When I enter the emailID and click on the Create an Account button
step.title: When I enter the emailID and click on the Create an Account button

step.name: Then I should navigate to the personal information page
step.title: Then I should navigate to the personal information page

test-case.name: To register, the user has to provide his/her personal information
test-case.title: To register, the user has to provide his/her personal information

step.name: Given I am on the personal information page
step.title: Given I am on the personal information page

step.name: When User enters the mandatory fields and click on Register button
step.title: When User enters the mandatory fields and click on Register button

step.name: Then The user should be registered and logged in successfully
step.title: Then The user should be registered and logged in successfully

test-case.name: To add a product to cart
test-case.title: To add a product to cart

step.name: Given User is logged in and on home page
step.title: Given User is logged in and on home page

step.name: When User views the product and clicks on add to cart
step.title: When User views the product and clicks on add to cart

step.name: Then The user should be able to complete the purchase
step.title: Then The user should be able to complete the purchase
